sn35.27:1.1: “Sabbam, bhikkhave, anabhijanam aparijanam avirajayam appajaham abhabbo dukkhakkhayaya.
sn35.27:1.2: Kinca, bhikkhave, sabbam anabhijanam aparijanam avirajayam appajaham abhabbo dukkhakkhayaya?
sn35.27:1.3: Yanca, bhikkhave, cakkhu, ye ca rupa, yanca cakkhuvinnanam, ye ca cakkhuvinnanavinnatabba dhamma …pe…
sn35.27:1.4: ya ca jivha, ye ca rasa, yanca jivhavinnanam, ye ca jivhavinnanavinnatabba dhamma;
sn35.27:1.5: yo ca kayo, ye ca photthabba, yanca kayavinnanam, ye ca kayavinnanavinnatabba dhamma;
sn35.27:1.6: yo ca mano, ye ca dhamma, yanca manovinnanam, ye ca manovinnanavinnatabba dhamma—
sn35.27:1.7: idam kho, bhikkhave, sabbam anabhijanam aparijanam avirajayam appajaham abhabbo dukkhakkhayaya.
sn35.27:2.1: Sabbam, bhikkhave, abhijanam parijanam virajayam pajaham bhabbo dukkhakkhayaya.
sn35.27:2.2: Kinca, bhikkhave, sabbam abhijanam parijanam virajayam pajaham bhabbo dukkhakkhayaya?
sn35.27:2.3: Yanca, bhikkhave, cakkhu, ye ca rupa, yanca cakkhuvinnanam, ye ca cakkhuvinnanavinnatabba dhamma …pe…
sn35.27:2.4: ya ca jivha, ye ca rasa, yanca jivhavinnanam, ye ca jivhavinnanavinnatabba dhamma;
sn35.27:2.5: yo ca kayo, ye ca photthabba, yanca kayavinnanam, ye ca kayavinnanavinnatabba dhamma;
sn35.27:2.6: yo ca mano, ye ca dhamma, yanca manovinnanam, ye ca manovinnanavinnatabba dhamma—
sn35.27:2.7: idam kho, bhikkhave, sabbam abhijanam parijanam virajayam pajaham bhabbo dukkhakkhayaya”ti.
